vulnerabilities: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
Improper Control of Resource Identifiers ('Resource Injection')
description:
The provided JavaScript function is vulnerable to multiple CWEs:

1. CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') - The function uses user-controlled input (chunk) directly in the console.log statements without proper sanitization or validation, which can lead to command injection vulnerabilities.

2. CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') - The function uses user-controlled input (chunk) to dynamically generate file
